name: reckless

effect.sword_shield: This Pokémon's recoil moves and crash moves have 1.2× their base power. struggle is unaffected. The "crash moves" are the moves that damage the user upon missing: jump kick and high jump kick.

effect.brilliant_diamond_and_shining_pearl: This Pokémon's recoil moves and crash moves have 1.2× their base power. struggle is unaffected. The "crash moves" are the moves that damage the user upon missing: jump kick and high jump kick.
effect.legends_arceus: This Pokémon's recoil moves and crash moves have 1.2× their base power. struggle is unaffected. The "crash moves" are the moves that damage the user upon missing: jump kick and high jump kick.

short_effect: Strengthens recoil moves to 1.2× their power.

flavor_text.sword_shield: Powers up moves that have recoil damage.
